caption: Attributed to Ammi Phillips (1788–1865; born Colebrook, CT; died Curtisville, MA), Mr. Goodrich of Hancock, Massachusetts, ca. 1812. Oil on canvas; 87.9 x 70.5 cm, 99.3 × 83.2 × 4.2 cm (frame). Gift of Edward Duff Balken, Class of 1897 (y1958-65)
